channel.title: CVE Feed for Clever -- saml2-js
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Clever -- saml2-js

item.title: CVE-2017-11429|2024-08-05T18:12:39.610Z -- clever -- saml2-js
item.description: Clever saml2-js 2.0 and earlier may incorrectly utilize the results of XML DOM traversal and canonicalization APIs in such a way that an attacker may be able to manipulate the SAML data without invalidating the cryptographic signature, allowing the attack to potentially bypass authentication to SAML service providers.
